trans-unit.source: Calling PDO::prepare() and PDOStatement::execute() for statements that will be issued multiple times with different parameter values optimizes the performance of your application by allowing the driver to negotiate client and/or server side caching of the query plan and meta information, and helps to prevent SQL injection attacks by eliminating the need to manually quote the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 为将使用不同参数值多次发出的语句调用PDO :: prepare（）和PDOStatement :: execute（）可通过允许驱动程序协商查询计划的客户端和/或服务器端缓存来优化应用程序的性能，并元信息，并消除了手动引用参数的需要，从而有助于防止SQL注入攻击。

trans-unit.source: Calling PDO::prepare() and PDOStatement::execute() for statements that will be issued multiple times with different parameter values optimizes the performance of your application by allowing the driver to negotiate client and/or server side caching of the query plan and meta information. Also, calling PDO::prepare() and PDOStatement::execute() helps to prevent SQL injection attacks by eliminating the need to manually quote and escape the parameters.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a statement. Any results associated with the statement that have not been consumed are deleted. trans-unit.target: 取消声明。与该语句关联的所有尚未使用的结果都将被删除。调用sqlsrv_cancel（）之后，如果指定的语句是使用sqlsrv_prepare（）创建的，则可以重新执行该语句。如果与该语句关联的所有结果均已消耗，则无需调用sqlsrv_cancel（）。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an ongoing HTTP request. The callback associated with this request is not executed and the request object is freed. If the request is currently being processed, e.g. it is ongoing, the corresponding EventHttpConnection object is going to get reset.
trans-unit.target: 取消正在进行的HTTP请求。不执行与此请求关联的回调，并且释放请求对象。如果请求当前正在处理中（例如正在处理中），则相应的EventHttpConnection对象将被重置。

trans-unit.source: Capturing subpatterns that occur inside negative lookahead assertions are counted, but their entries in the offsets vector are never set. Perl sets its numerical variables from any such patterns that are matched before the assertion fails to match something (thereby succeeding), but only if the negative lookahead assertion contains just one branch.
trans-unit.target: 发生在负向查找断言中的捕获子模式会被计算在内,但它们在偏移向量中的条目永远不会被设置。Perl 会从断言失败(从而成功)之前匹配的任何此类模式中设置其数值变量,但只有在负向查找断言只包含一个分支的情况下才会设置。

trans-unit.source: Causes the worker to wait for activity from one of the Gearman job servers when operating in non-blocking I/O mode. On failure, issues a E_WARNING with the last Gearman error encountered.
trans-unit.target: 在非阻塞I / O模式下操作时，使工作人员等待Gearman作业服务器之一的活动。失败时，发出 E_WARNING 并遇到最后一个Gearman错误。

trans-unit.source: Causing this function to return a multi-dimensional array with categories in the keys of the first dimension and constants and their values in the second dimension.
trans-unit.target: 使该函数返回一个多维数组,在第一维的键中包含类别,在第二维中包含常量及其值。

trans-unit.source: Cellular
trans-unit.target: Cellular

trans-unit.source: Certain characters have special significance in HTML, and should be represented by HTML entities if they are to preserve their meanings. This function returns a string with these conversions made. If you require all input substrings that have associated named entities to be translated, use htmlentities() instead.
trans-unit.target: 某些字符在HTML中具有特殊意义，如果要保留其含义，则应由HTML实体表示。该函数返回经过这些转换的字符串。如果您需要翻译具有关联的命名实体的所有输入子字符串，请改用htmlentities（）。

trans-unit.source: Certain items that may appear in patterns are more efficient than others. It is more efficient to use a character class like [aeiou] than a set of alternatives such as (a|e|i|o|u). In general, the simplest construction that provides the required behaviour is usually the most efficient. Jeffrey Friedl's book contains a lot of discussion about optimizing regular expressions for efficient performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些可能出现在模式中的项目比其他项目更有效率。使用像[aeiou]这样的字符类,比使用一组诸如(a|e|i|o|u)这样的替代项更有效率。一般来说,能提供所需行为的最简单构造通常是最高效的。Jeffrey Friedl的书中有很多关于优化正则表达式以实现高效性能的讨论。

trans-unit.source: Certain parameter values are reported by the server automatically at connection startup or whenever their values change. pg_parameter_status() can be used to interrogate these settings. It returns the current value of a parameter if known, or FALSE if the parameter is not known.
trans-unit.target: 服务器会在连接启动时或每当其值更改时自动报告某些参数值。pg_parameter_status（）可用于询问这些设置。如果已知，它将返回参数的当前值；如果未知，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Certain parameter values are reported by the server automatically at connection startup or whenever their values change. pg_parameter_status() can be used to interrogate these settings. It returns the current value of a parameter if known, or false if the parameter is not known.
Change between each call of the callback (from 0.0 to 1.0).
Change the brightness and/or contrast of an image. It converts the brightness and contrast parameters into slope and intercept and calls a polynomical function to apply to the image.
trans-unit.target: 改变图像的亮度和/或对比度。它将亮度和对比度参数转换为斜率和截距,并调用多项式函数应用于图像。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of an array to the new size of size. If size is less than the current array size, any values after the new size will be discarded. If size is greater than the current array size, the array will be padded with NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 将数组的大小更改为size的新 size 。如果 size 小于当前数组的大小，则新大小之后的所有值都将被丢弃。如果 size 大于当前数组的大小，则将使用 NULL 值填充该数组。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of an array to the new size of size. If size is less than the current array size, any values after the new size will be discarded. If size is greater than the current array size, the array will be padded with null values.

trans-unit.source: Change warning information to the next warning if possible.
Changed initial to allow mixed, previously integer.
trans-unit.target: 更改 initial 以允许混合，以前是整数。

trans-unit.source: Changed from an alias of SplFileObject::current() to an alias of SplFileObject::fgets().
Changed the context parameter to actually have an effect. Previously, any context was ignored.
trans-unit.target: 更改了 context 参数以实际生效。以前，任何 context 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Changed the default value of sort_flags back to SORT_STRING.
trans-unit.target: 将 sort_flags 的默认值更改回 SORT_STRING 。

trans-unit.source: Changed the function to use the streams API. It means that you can use it with wrappers, like md5_file('http://example.com/..')
trans-unit.target: 更改了使用流API的功能。这意味着您可以将其与包装一起使用，例如md5_file（'http://example.com/ ..'）

trans-unit.source: Changed the function to use the streams API. It means that you can use it with wrappers, like sha1_file('http://example.com/..')
trans-unit.target: 更改了使用流API的功能。这意味着您可以将其与包装一起使用，例如sha1_file（'http://example.com/ ..'）

trans-unit.source: Changed the return value on success from NULL to DateTime.
trans-unit.target: 将成功时的返回值从 NULL 更改为DateTime。

trans-unit.source: Changed: A trailing comma can now be added to the group-use syntax for namespaces.
Changed: Abstract methods can now be overridden when an abstract class extends another abstract class.
Changed: An E_WARNING level error is issued if the magic overloading methods are declared static. It also enforces the public visibility requirement.
trans-unit.target: 更改：如果将魔术重载方法声明为static，则发出 E_WARNING 级错误。它还强制执行公众可见性要求。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Classes that implement interfaces with methods that have default values in the prototype are no longer required to match the interface's default value.
trans-unit.target: 改变了。实现接口的类,其方法在原型中具有默认值,不再需要与接口的默认值匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Defining (compatible) properties in two used traits no longer triggers an error.
Changed: If an abstract class defines a signature for the constructor it will now be enforced.
Changed: If an abstract class defines a signature for the constructor it will now be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 更改：如果抽象类为构造函数定义了签名，则现在将强制它。

trans-unit.source: Changed: In previous versions of PHP 5, the use of var was considered deprecated and would issue an E_STRICT level error. It's no longer deprecated, therefore does not emit the error.
Changed: In previous versions of PHP 5, the use of var was considered deprecated and would issue an E_STRICT level error. It's no longer deprecated, therefore does not emit the error.
trans-unit.target: 更改：在PHP 5的早期版本中，不建议使用var，它将发出 E_STRICT 级错误。它不再被弃用，因此不会发出错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed: It is now possible to throw exception within __toString().
Changed: It's now possible to reference the class using a variable (e.g., echo $classname::constant;). The variable's value can not be a keyword (e.g., self, parent or static).
Changed: It's now possible to reference the class using a variable (e.g., echo $classname::constant;). The variable's value can not be a keyword (e.g., self, parent or static).
trans-unit.target: 更改：现在可以使用变量来引用类（例如，echo $ classname :: constant;）。变量的值不能是关键字（例如self，parent或static）。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Methods with the same name as the last element of a namespaced class name will no longer be treated as constructor. This change doesn't affect non-namespaced classes.
trans-unit.target: 更改：与命名空间类名称的最后一个元素具有相同名称的方法将不再被视为Constructor。此更改不会影响非命名空间的类。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Methods with the same name as the last element of a namespaced class name will no longer be treated as constructor. This change doesn't affect non-namespaced classes.
Changed: Parameter type widening. Parameter types from overridden methods and from interface implementations may now be omitted.

Changed: Prior to 5.3.0, exceptions thrown in the __autoload() function could not be caught in the catch block, and would result in a fatal error. Exceptions now thrown in the __autoload function can be caught in the catch block, with one provison. If throwing a custom exception, then the custom exception class must be available. The __autoload function may be used recursively to autoload the custom exception class.
trans-unit.target: 更改：在5.3.0之前，__ autoload（）函数中引发的异常无法在catch块中捕获，并会导致致命错误。__autoload函数中现在引发的异常可以通过一个限制在catch块中捕获。如果引发自定义异常，则自定义异常类必须可用。可以递归使用__autoload函数自动加载自定义异常类。

trans-unit.source: Changed: The __set_state() static method is now called for classes exported by var_export().
trans-unit.target: 更改：现在，对于由var_export（）导出的类调用__set_state（）静态方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed: The __toString() method was only called when it was directly combined with echo or print. But now, it is called in any string context (e.g. in printf() with %s modifier) but not in other types contexts (e.g. with %d modifier). As of PHP 5.2.0, converting objects without a __toString method to string emits a E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR level error.

Changed: The __toString() method was only called when it was directly combined with echo or print. But now, it is called in any string context (e.g. in printf() with %s modifier) but not in other types contexts (e.g. with %d modifier). Since PHP 5.2.0, converting objects without a __toString method to string emits a E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR level error.
trans-unit.target: 更改：__toString（）方法仅在与echo或print直接组合时才被调用。但是现在，它可以在任何字符串上下文中（例如，在具有％s修饰符的printf（）中）被调用，而在其他类型的上下文中（例如，具有％d修饰符）则不会被调用。从PHP 5.2.0开始，将没有__toString方法的对象转换为字符串会产生 E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR 级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed: The instanceof operator now allows literals as the first operand, in which case the result is always false.
Changed: The following name cannot be used to name classes, interfaces, or traits: object.
Changed: The following names cannot be used to name classes, interfaces, or traits: void and iterable.

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of an image to the given dimensions and removes any associated profiles. The goal is to produce small low cost thumbnail images suited for display on the Web. If TRUE is given as a third parameter then columns and rows parameters are used as maximums for each side. Both sides will be scaled down until the match or are smaller than the parameter given for the side.
trans-unit.target: 将图像的大小改为给定的尺寸,并删除任何相关的配置文件。目标是生成适合在网络上显示的小型低成本缩略图。如果给定TRUE作为第三个参数,那么列和行参数将作为每边的最大值。两边将被缩小,直到匹配或小于为边所给的参数。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of an image to the given dimensions and removes any associated profiles. The goal is to produce small, low cost thumbnail images suited for display on the Web. If TRUE is given as a third parameter then columns and rows parameters are used as maximums for each side. trans-unit.source: Changes the size of an image to the given dimensions and removes any associated profiles. The goal is to produce small, low cost thumbnail images suited for display on the Web. trans-unit.source: Circumflex (^) need not be the first character of the pattern if a number of alternatives are involved, but it should be the first thing in each alternative in which it appears if the pattern is ever to match that branch. If all possible alternatives start with a circumflex (^), that is, if the pattern is constrained to match only at the start of the subject, it is said to be an "anchored" pattern. (There are also other constructs that can cause a pattern to be anchored.)

Circumflex (^) need not be the first character of the pattern if a number of alternatives are involved, but it should be the first thing in each alternative in which it appears if the pattern is ever to match that branch. If all possible alternatives start with a circumflex (^), that is, if the pattern is constrained to match only at the start of the subject, it is said to be an "anchored" pattern. (There are also other constructs that can cause a pattern to be anchored.)
trans-unit.target: 如果涉及多种选择，则抑扬符（^）不必是模式的第一个字符，但是如果模式曾经与该分支匹配，则它应该是每种选择中的第一件事。如果所有可能的选择都以抑扬符（^）开头，也就是说，如果该模式被约束为仅在对象开始时才匹配，则称其为“锚定”模式。（还有其他可能导致模式锚定的构造。）

trans-unit.source: Class member variables are called "properties". You may also see them referred to using other terms such as "attributes" or "fields", but for the purposes of this reference we will use "properties". They are defined by using one of the keywords public, protected, or private, followed by a normal variable declaration. This declaration may include an initialization, but this initialization must be a constant value--that is, it must be able to be evaluated at compile time and must not depend on run-time information in order to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 类成员变量称为“属性”。您可能还会看到使用其他术语（例如“属性”或“字段”）来引用它们，但是出于参考目的，我们将使用“属性”。它们是使用关键字public，protected或private之一定义的，后跟普通变量声明。该声明可以包含一个初始化，但是此初始化必须是一个常量值-也就是说，它必须能够在编译时进行评估，并且必须不依赖于运行时信息才能进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Class member variables are called properties. You may also see them referred to using other terms such as attributes or fields, but for the purposes of this reference we will use properties. They are defined by using one of the keywords public, protected, or private, optionally followed by a type declaration, followed by a normal variable declaration. This declaration may include an initialization, but this initialization must be a constant value--that is, it must be able to be evaluated at compile time and must not depend on run-time information in order to be evaluated.
Class methods may be defined as public, private, or protected. Methods declared without any explicit visibility keyword are defined as public.
trans-unit.target: 类方法可以被定义为public、private或protected。没有任何显式可见性关键字的方法被定义为public。

trans-unit.source: Class properties and methods live in separate "namespaces", so it is possible to have a property and a method with the same name. Referring to both a property and a method has the same notation, and whether a property will be accessed or a method will be called, solely depends on the context, i.e. whether the usage is a variable access or a function call.
trans-unit.target: 类的属性和方法分别生活在不同的 "命名空间 "中,所以有可能出现一个属性和一个方法同名的情况。引用一个属性和一个方法都有相同的记号,是访问一个属性还是调用一个方法,完全取决于上下文,即用法是变量访问还是函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Class properties may also be accessed using variable property names. The variable property name will be resolved within the scope from which the call is made. For instance, if you have an expression such as <var>$foo->$bar</var>, then the local scope will be examined for <var>$bar</var> and its value will be used as the name of the property of <var>$foo</var>. This is also true if <var>$bar</var> is an array access.

Class properties may also be accessed using variable property names. The variable property name will be resolved within the scope from which the call is made. For instance, if you have an expression such as <var><var>$foo->$bar</var></var>, then the local scope will be examined for <var><var>$bar</var></var> and its value will be used as the name of the property of <var><var>$foo</var></var>. This is also true if <var><var>$bar</var></var> is an array access.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用变量属性名称来访问类属性。变量属性名称将在进行调用的范围内解析。例如，如果您有一个表达式，例如 <var><var>$foo->$bar</var></var> ，那么将检查本地范围中的 <var><var>$bar</var></var> 并将其值用作 <var><var>$foo</var></var> 属性的名称。如果 <var><var>$bar</var></var> 是数组访问，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Class properties must be defined as public, private, or protected. If declared using var, the property will be defined as public.
trans-unit.target: 类属性必须定义为公共，私有或受保护的。如果使用var声明，则该属性将定义为public。

trans-unit.source: Classes extending/implementing may broaden methods using array or Traversable as parameter types to iterable or narrow return types from iterable to array or Traversable.

Classes implementing Countable can be used with the count() function.

trans-unit.source: Classes implementing RecursiveIterator can be used to iterate over iterators recursively.
trans-unit.target: 实现RecursiveIterator的类可用于递归迭代迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface no longer support __sleep() and __wakeup(). The method serialize is called whenever an instance needs to be serialized. This does not invoke __destruct() or have any other side effect unless programmed inside the method. When the data is unserialized the class is known and the appropriate unserialize() method is called as a constructor instead of calling __construct(). If you need to execute the standard constructor you may do so in the method.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类不再支持__sleep（）和__wakeup（）。每当实例需要序列化时，都会调用serialize方法。除非在方法内部进行编程，否则这不会调用__destruct（）或产生任何其他副作用。当数据被非序列化时，该类是已知的，并且将适当的unserialize（）方法作为构造函数调用，而不是调用__construct（）。如果需要执行标准构造函数，则可以在方法中执行。

trans-unit.source: Classes which extends PDO and implements the __call magic method will now receive the method name in the declared casing. Previously this was always lower case.
trans-unit.target: 现在，扩展PDO并实现__call magic方法的类将在声明的大小写中接收方法名称。以前，这总是小写。

trans-unit.source: Clears all the task callback functions that have previously been set.
trans-unit.target: 清除之前设置的所有任务回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Clears either all of the fields or a specific field. A cleared field is marked as unset, giving it the lowest priority against overlapping fields or even default values when calculating the time. Additionally, its value is set to 0, though given the fieldʼs low priority, its value may have been internally set to another value by the time the field has finished been queried.

Clears either all of the fields or a specific field. A cleared field is marked as unset, giving it the lowest priority against overlapping fields or even default values when calculating the time. Additionally, its value is set to 0, though given the fieldʼs low priority, its value may have been internally set to another value by the time the field has finished been queried.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有字段或特定字段。清除的字段被标记为未设置，因此在计算时间时，相对于重叠的字段甚至是默认值，它的优先级最低。此外，尽管给定字段的优先级较低，但它的值设置为0，但在查询完该字段时，其值可能已在内部设置为另一个值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the ImagickDraw object of any accumulated commands, and resets the settings it contains to their defaults.
trans-unit.target: 清除ImagickDraw对象的所有累积命令,并将其包含的设置重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the ImagickPixel object, leaving it in a fresh state. This also unsets any color associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 清除ImagickPixel对象,使其处于新状态。这也会取消设置与该对象相关联的任何颜色。

trans-unit.source: Clip mask Id
trans-unit.target: 夾式面具ID

trans-unit.source: Clips along the first path from the 8BIM profile, if present.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件的第一条路径进行剪辑。

trans-unit.source: Clips along the named paths from the 8BIM profile, if present. Later operations take effect inside the path. Id may be a number if preceded with #, to work on a numbered path, e.g., "#1" to use the first path.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件中的命名路径进行剪辑。后面的操作在路径内生效,如果前面有#,Id可以是数字,以便在有编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "使用第一个路径。如果前面有#,Id可以是一个数字,以便在有编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "使用第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Clips along the named paths from the 8BIM profile, if present. Later operations take effect inside the path. It may be a number if preceded with #, to work on a numbered path, e.g., "#1" to use the first path.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件中的命名路径进行剪辑。后面的操作在路径内生效。如果前面有#,则可以是数字,以便在编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "表示使用第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Clones a function.
trans-unit.target: 克隆一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Clones the current ImagickDraw to create a new ImagickDraw, which is then added to the ImagickDraw stack. The original drawing ImagickDraw(s) may be returned to by invoking pop(). The ImagickDraws are stored on a ImagickDraw stack. For every Pop there must have already been an equivalent Push.
trans-unit.target: 克隆当前的ImagickDraw以创建一个新的ImagickDraw,然后将其添加到ImagickDraw堆栈中。原有的ImagickDraw可以通过调用pop()返回。ImagickDraws存储在ImagickDraw堆栈中。每一个 Pop 都必须有一个等价的 Push。

trans-unit.source: Clones.
trans-unit.target: Clones.

trans-unit.source: Close RAR archive and free all allocated resources.
Close a connection to a remote SSH server.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与远程SSH服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Close opened or created archive and save changes. This method is automatically called at the end of the script.
trans-unit.target: 关闭已打开或创建的存档并保存更改。本方法在脚本结束时自动调用。

trans-unit.source: Close punctuation
trans-unit.target: 关闭标点符号

trans-unit.source: Close the sender side of the socket and include an appropriate notification of this at the end of the sent data. The sent data completes the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 关闭套接字的发送端,并在发送数据的结尾处加入适当的通知。发送的数据就完成了交易。

trans-unit.source: Closed resources are now reported as 'resource (closed)'. Previously the returned value for closed resources were 'unknown type'.
Closed resources are now reported as 'resource (closed)'. Previously the returned value for closed resources were 'unknown type'.
trans-unit.target: 现在，已关闭的资源被报告为“资源（已关闭）”。以前，封闭资源的返回值是'unknown type'。

trans-unit.source: Closes HTTP connection associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与该请求相关联的HTTP连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes a cURL session and frees all resources. The cURL handle, ch, is also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 关闭cURL会话并释放所有资源。cURL句柄 ch 也将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Closes a cURL session and frees all resources. The cURL handle, handle, is also deleted.
Closes a cURL share handle and frees all resources.
trans-unit.target: 关闭一个cURL共享句柄,释放所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Closes a file pointer to a pipe opened by popen().
trans-unit.target: 关闭指向由popen（）打开的管道的文件指针。

trans-unit.source: Closes a prepared statement. mysqli_stmt_close() also deallocates the statement handle. If the current statement has pending or unread results, this function cancels them so that the next query can be executed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭准备好的语句。mysqli_stmt_close（）也取消分配语句句柄。如果当前语句具有待处理或未读的结果，则此函数将其取消，以便可以执行下一个查询。

trans-unit.source: Closes a previously opened connection.
Closes a previously opened database connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭之前打开的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes a set of cURL handles.
trans-unit.target: 关闭一组cURL句柄。

trans-unit.source: Closes an open connection and releases resourses associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭一个开放的连接并释放与该连接相关的资源。

trans-unit.source: Closes down the connection to the database server.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes file descriptor associated with the current buffer event.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与当前缓冲区事件相关联的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Closes previously opened persistent connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭之前打开的持久连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes the FDF document.
Closes the current session. This function is automatically executed when closing the session, or explicitly via session_write_close().
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前会话。该函数在关闭会话时自动执行，或通过session_write_close（）显式执行。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current session. This method is automatically executed internally by PHP when closing the session, or explicitly via session_write_close() (which first calls the SessionHandler::write()).
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前会话。此方法由PHP在关闭会话时自动在内部执行，或通过session_write_close（）（首先调用SessionHandler :: write（））显式执行。

trans-unit.source: Closes the database connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes the directory stream indicated by dir_handle. The stream must have previously been opened by opendir().
trans-unit.target: 关闭由 dir_handle 指示的目录流。流必须事先由opendir（）打开。

trans-unit.source: Closes the given ZIP file archive.
trans-unit.target: 关闭给定的ZIP文件档案。

trans-unit.source: Closes the given bzip2 file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 关闭给定的bzip2文件指针。

trans-unit.source: Closes the given gz-file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 关闭给定的gz-文件指针。

trans-unit.source: Closes the imap stream.
trans-unit.target: 关闭imap流。

trans-unit.source: Closes the input the XMLReader object is currently parsing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭XMLReader对象当前正在解析的输入。

trans-unit.source: Closes the link to an InterBase database that's associated with a connection id returned from ibase_connect(). Default transaction on link is committed, other transactions are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与ibase_connect（）返回的连接ID关联的InterBase数据库的链接。链接上的默认事务已提交，其他事务已回滚。

trans-unit.source: Closes the prepared statement.
trans-unit.target: 结束准备的发言。

trans-unit.source: Closes the result set.
trans-unit.target: 关闭结果集。

trans-unit.source: Closes the specified directory entry.
trans-unit.target: 关闭指定的目录条目。

trans-unit.source: Closes the specified encryption handle.
trans-unit.target: 关闭指定的加密句柄。

trans-unit.source: Closures can also be used as the values of variables; PHP automatically converts such expressions into instances of the Closure internal class. Assigning a closure to a variable uses the same syntax as any other assignment, including the trailing semicolon:
trans-unit.target: 闭包也可以用作变量的值；PHP自动将此类表达式转换为Closure内部类的实例。将闭包分配给变量使用的语法与其他任何赋值相同，包括结尾的分号：

trans-unit.source: Closures may also inherit variables from the parent scope. Any such variables must be passed to the use language construct. As of PHP 7.1, these variables must not include superglobals, $this, or variables with the same name as a parameter.

Closures may also inherit variables from the parent scope. Any such variables must be passed to the use language construct. From PHP 7.1, these variables must not include superglobals, $this, or variables with the same name as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 闭包也可以从父范围继承变量。任何此类变量都必须传递给使用语言构造。从PHP 7.1开始，这些变量不得包含superglobals， $this 或与参数同名的变量。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction and returns the new revision
Commits a transaction in progress.

Commits a transaction that was begun with sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). The connection is returned to auto-commit mode after sqlsrv_commit() is called. The transaction that is committed includes all statements that were executed after the call to sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). Explicit transactions should be started and committed or rolled back using these functions instead of executing SQL statements that begin and commit/roll back transactions. For more information, see » SQLSRV Transactions.

Commits a transaction that was begun with sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). The connection is returned to auto-commit mode after sqlsrv_commit() is called. The transaction that is committed includes all statements that were executed after the call to sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). Explicit transactions should be started and committed or rolled back using these functions instead of executing SQL statements that begin and committ/roll back transactions. For more information, see » SQLSRV Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 提交以sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）开始的事务。调用sqlsrv_commit（）后，连接将返回到自动提交模式。提交的事务包括在调用sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）之后执行的所有语句。应该使用这些函数来启动和提交显式事务，或者使用这些函数来回滚显式事务，而不是执行开始和提交/回滚事务的SQL语句。有关更多信息，请参见»SQLSRV Transactions。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction without closing it.
trans-unit.target: 承诺交易,但不结束交易。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction, returning the database connection to autocommit mode until the next call to PDO::beginTransaction() starts a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 提交事务，使数据库连接返回到自动提交模式，直到下一次调用PDO :: beginTransaction（）开始新事务。

trans-unit.source: Compares each image the GIF disposed forms of the previous image in the sequence. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 比较每个图像的GIF处置形式的序列中的前一个图像。它试图从中选择最小的裁剪图像来替换每一帧,同时保留动画的结果。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

Compression must be one of Phar::GZ, Phar::BZ2 to add compression, or Phar::NONE to remove compression.
Compression must be one of Phar::GZ, Phar::BZ2 to add compression, or Phar::NONE to remove compression.

trans-unit.source: Compute the » Legendre symbol of a and p. p should be odd and must be positive.

Computes a digest hash value for the given data using a given method, and returns a raw or binhex encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的方法计算给定数据的摘要哈希值,并返回一个原始或binhex编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Computes the difference of arrays by using a callback function for data comparison. This is unlike array_diff() which uses an internal function for comparing the data.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用回调函数进行数据比较来计算数组的差值。这与使用内部函数比较数据的array_diff（）不同。

trans-unit.source: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by a callback function.
trans-unit.target: 计算数组的差值并附加索引检查,通过回调函数比较数据和索引。

trans-unit.source: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function.

trans-unit.source: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by separate callback functions.
